venue.name: Todd Morsilli Clay Court Tennis Center, ROGER WILLIAMS PARK

item.description:
Join SPOT for Beginner-Intermediate Tennis Classes where you will improve your basic skills of the game of tennis, practice more consistency, learn to add power or spin; introduction to tactical strategy.

You will meet lots of others who are looking to improve their tennis skills. THe class is open to men and women.  It is a great way to learn to compete in the game and to meet others who share your interest to play tennis.

Players should be playing at at least a 3.0 level of play.

Players should plan to attend a full session of classes to receive the $15 per class rate; or pay per drop in play at $20 per class.  They may opt to come once per week or twice per week.

Classes are held on Tuesdays and Thursdays from 6:30 - 8PM.

April 30 - June 20 ($120 / $240)

June 24 - Aug 15 ($120 / $240) ( no class July 4 - make up will be held on July 3.)

Aug 19 - Sep 18 (only one hour 6:30 - 7:30  ($50 / $100)
item.how_to_find_us: next to zoo in Roger Williams Park Providence, RI
item.name: Intermediate Tennis Classes
